root.name: Elite Soccer
root.description: Elite Soccer/World Cup Striker was basically a repackaged version of Striker, with new features and few improvements.Elite Soccer was also released for the Game Boy. Developed by Denton Designs, it was also published in Japan by Coconuts Japan as "World Cup Striker", and in Europe as "Soccer".

similar_games.game: Nippon Daihyou Team: Eikou no Eleven
